SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_role (name, permissions, status, type, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_role set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permissions = #{permissions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, permissions, status, type, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from sys_role
